Collection Description: The sleek yet elegant curves of the Adrienne sleigh design are the perfect blend of traditional and modern. The high headboard and footboard create a visual sanctuary for rest and relaxation. Crafted from the finest woods, all pieces are available in your choice of finishes. An upholstered headboard and footboard are also available to add texture and color to the room.

Collection Description: In every nuance of this luxurious collection, Longmeadow boasts a strong, refined tranquility. Classic details like large, inset headboard and footboard panels and chamfered edging add a timeless elegance to any room. Available in a variety of wood species and finishes, each piece is crafted by skilled artisans to ensure every detail is perfectly created to exact specifications.

Collection Description: A lush rolling island known for its relaxed style of luxurious-simplicity, beauty and elegance inspires this collection’s look. The panel bed, based on early 1800s style, features generous, beautifully carved posts and a graceful fireplace mantel top. A unique, curved crown and large raised panels complete the design. The arched panel bed is based upon the arched entryway into the original Bartlett Mansion. The towering 72-inch headboard features a gracefully arched mantel, flanked by Roman posts and raised panels. Both bed designs and coordinating pieces are available in a variety of wood species and finishes.

https://www.mavinfurniture.com/wp-conten.caption: BARTLETT’S ISLAND BEDROOM GROUP: Bartlett’s Island Chifferobe 3 BAR13258, Bartlett’s Island Nightstand 1 BAR13241, Bartlett’s Island Dresser 6 BAR13252, with Mirror 5 BAR13305, Bartlett’s Island King Arched Panel Bed with High Footboard BAR13412. Collection Description: Simple yet sophisticated, Vineyard Haven features luxurious detailing. The classically patterned clean style appeals to both masculine and feminine influences with chiseled edges and soft details. Available in wood or upholstered bed styles, this collection is available in a variety of wood species and finishes. An array of coordinating nightstands, dressers, mirrors and chests are also available.

Collection Description: The Kingsport collection offers refined lines and curve appeal for your style conscious and creative tastes. Our panel bed design radiates strength and elegance in any choice of stain. While the upholstered bed combines the beauty of solid wood with subtle curves and rich fabrics. Coordinating nightstands, dressers, mirrors and chests are also available to complement either bed design choice.

Collection Description: Elegant southern living is showcased in this modern farmhouse collection. Ornate edges with intricate craftsmanship welcome a charm all of its own with inset slatted panels and strong lines. Available in a variety of wood species and finishes, each piece is crafted by skilled artisans to exact specifications. Coordinating nightstands, dressers, mirrors and chests are also available.

Anchored by a plush upholstered bed, each piece is expertly crafted by skilled artisans, ensuring exceptional quality. The dark stains evoke a sense of sophistication, while the gold hardware adds a lavish touch. With sleek lines and elegant corners, this collection embodies timeless beauty and modern flair, providing a refined and stylish haven for your dreams.
